title: Choice and constraint
description: Toy example that chooses a menu with exactly one main course and one drink (DLV1-compatible).
code:
main(pasta).
main(pizza).
main(salad).

drink(water).
drink(wine).

{ choose_main(M) : main(M) }.
{ choose_drink(D) : drink(D) }.

:- #count { M : choose_main(M) } != 1.
:- #count { D : choose_drink(D) } != 1.

:- choose_main(pizza), choose_drink(wine).
